scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: This collection comprises a bound volume of 91 drawings of European women's fashion from the 1940s. The names of the dresses are handwritten on the drawings in pencil. Languages include French, German, and English.

Each drawing measures approximately 8 x 11 inches. Every page is hand-painted on onion-skin paper by a single artist employing the same style. The album measures 12 x 15 inches and bears the title Modelle on the front page.
